Class ExecutionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcore.ExecutionService

  • public class ExecutionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all scenario instances.

      • openExistingScenarioInstance

                                   int scenarioInstance_id)
        Open a existing scenario instance.
        Parameters:
        scenario_id - This is the id of the scenario.
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the id of the scenario instance.
        Returns:
        true if the scenario instance could been open and exist. false if the scenario instance couldn't been open.

      • beginActivity

        public boolean beginActivity(int scenarioInstance_id,
                    int activity_id)
        Starts the execution of an activity which is enabled.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the id of the scenario instance.
        activity_id - This is the id of the activity.
        Returns:
        true if the activity could been started. false if not.

      • beginActivityInstance

        public boolean beginActivityInstance(int scenarioInstance_id,
                            int activityInstance_id)
        Starts the execution of an activity specified by the params. The state will only be changed if the activity is enabled.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the id of the scenario instance.
        activityInstance_id - Specifies the activity instance id.
        Returns:
        Indicates the success. True if the activity has been started, else false.

      • terminateActivityInstance

        public boolean terminateActivityInstance(int scenarioInstance_id,
                                int activityInstance_id)
        Terminates the execution of an activity specified by the params. The state will only be changed if the activity is enabled.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the id of the scenario instance.
        activityInstance_id - Specifies the activity instance id.
        Returns:
        Indicates the success. True if the activity has been started, else false.

      • getEnabledActivities

        public java.util.Collection<ActivityInstance> getEnabledActivities(int scenarioInstanceId)
        Returns information about all enabled Activities of a given scenario instance
        Returns:
        a Collection of Activity instances, which are enabled and part of the specified scenario instance.

      • getTerminatedActivities

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • setDataAttributeValues

        public void setDataAttributeValues(int scenarioInstance_id,
                          int activityInstanceID,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> values)
        Sets the values of the data attributes for an activity instance.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstance_id - The id of the scenario instance.
        activityInstanceID - The id of the activity instance.
        values - A Map with the data attribute instance id as key and the value of the data attribute as value.
